message: Trying to force what he wants on the country -- an uncooperative congress is no excuse for his behavior, etc. His wife saying she wasn't proud of this country until they elected her husband. The elitist way of treating the country like they know what is best for everyone because we are too stupid to decide for ourselves--too much big government and welfare, unemployment compensation going on for years that does not encourage people to work at getting any kind of job. He could have instituted job training programs, more public works programs that put people to work, but instead he gives handouts. My good friend, a black professional, says she is infuriated by this """"plantation mentality"""" of his. If you train people to do a skill or trade they can support themselves. Him demonizing the police all the time (sometimes the police were in the wrong--but he inflamed racial tensions when he did that). I am running out of phone battery, so will not be able to stay on much longer.
Horrible !! .. but..where did the blood come from ?
Duckworth amazes me with her patience. I remember her staying firm while a House member stated that women deserve less VA Benefits because they don't get injured in combat.
Jim Brady, you are a goddamned effing idiot. ISIS did not exist in 2001!!!! But they were co-founded by George W. Bush.
Time to look down the road, and not in the rear-view mirror... ... I believe the folks in the UK have enough challenges in the here-and-now.

Well """"Tricky Ted"""" has apologized to Dr. Carson, THE nicest person, bar none, in the race. A true Christian, pure of heart, a man of great faith. Cruz holds himself as a true Christian, Christian values. A true Christian would not use false, deceptive tricks to harm someone like Dr, Carson. It's unethical, unprofessional. He stole votes. That cannot be looked upon as a Godly act. The issue is not what Hillary does or fails to do. Cruz wants to do dirty tricks to Hillary, that would be like minded, Hillary would hit back in the same vein. But not Carson. Carson never attacked Cruz. To me Cruz appears to be cut from the same cloth as Richard """"Tricky Dick"""" Nixon. I personally would never vote for someone who stole votes from Dr. Carson, a good and decent man.
